p: Each frying oil used was allowed to cool for a period of exactly 30 min. between each repetitive frying episode (a total of 8 per full daily cycle). Following each 10 min. frying episode, chips were thoroughly shaken in their wire basket for 15 s, and then allowed to drain therein for 30 s in order to remove excess oil. Subsequently, these chips were transferred to a steel mesh draining board.
